DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether par plana vitrectomy combination triamcinolone acetate effective treatment macular edema due branch retinal vein occlusion .
DOC.brief_title: Combined Vitrectomy Triamcinolone Macular Edema Secondary Branch Retinal Vein Occlusion ( BRVO )
DOC.criteria: Macular edema secondary BRVO Best Corrected Visual Acuity ≤ 20/40 ETDRS chart Duration shorter 3 month Duration longer 12 month Proliferations study eye Blod vitreous cavity Previous fundus laser treatment BRVO 180˚ ischemia FA Age 18 Other eye condition contribute relevant loss visual acuity
